pkgmetadata.longdescription: Normal Beta Prime Prior // Implements Bayesian linear regression, variable selection, normal means estimation, and multiple hypothesis testing using the normal-beta prime prior, as introduced by Bai and Ghosh (2018) arXiv:1807.02421 and Bai and Ghosh (2018) arXiv:1807.06539. Normal means estimation and multiple testing for the Dirichlet-Laplace doi:10.1080/01621459.2014.960967 and horseshoe+ priors doi:10.1214/16-BA1028 are also available in this package.
